AquaVR turns any Pool
into VR Arena

AquaVR turns any Pool
into VR Arena

AquaVR is a double-tube full-face snorkel mask with a built-in waterproof compartment for the Meta Quest 3 VR headset made specifically for underwater activities and adventure, gives users a unique experience, tactile sensations and audio transmission underwater

Experience crystal-clear views and effortless breathing with an advanced double-tube design

Waterproof Silicone Case lets you realistically touch fishes, move things, and react underwater

Ergonomic design ensures a comfortable fit with anti-leak and anti-fog features

Haptic Feedback with six preset patterns from low vibration to very hard kicks

Built-in waterproof Compartment securely houses your Meta Quest 3 headset

How it works

Prepare Your Gear

Place your Meta Quest 3 VR headset into the waterproof compartment of the AquaVR mask

Dive in

Put on your snorkeling vest and AquaVR mask with waterproof controllers and dive into the water

Activate VR Mode

Use the intuitive controls and start your "Atlantis Explorer" adventure in stunning virtual reality

Try It Now

Exclusively designed for AquaVR and Meta Quest 3, "Atlantis Explorer" takes you on epic underwater quests. Explore ancient cities, navigate through sunken planes and ships from different centuries, and discover treasure chests from shipwrecks

Single or team play for up to 10 players

Historical Exploration

Encounter remnants of ancient civilizations and historical wrecks, each telling its own story

Breathtaking Landscapes

Swim through vibrant coral reefs, mysterious caves, and stunning underwater vistas

Ocean Inhabitants

Meet a variety of marine life, and face off against formidable underwater monsters

Compatible with

Play Now
